word: The redeemed will meet and recognize those whose attention they have directed to the uplifted Saviour. What blessed converse they have with these souls! "I was a sinner," it will be said, . . . "and you came to me, and drew my attention to the precious Saviour as my only hope. And I believed in Him." . . . What rejoicing there will be as these redeemed ones meet and greet those who have had a burden in their behalf!-- Review and Herald, Jan. 5, 1905.
